user_caity.description: A nine-year-old girl in worn overalls with a shock of wild, curly brown hair and sparkling blue eyes. She has a wooden sword hanging from one of her belt loops and she's sucking a glowing, heart-shaped red hot atomic fireball candy. She might share one with you if you ask nicely. (Try using 'look caity' to examine her more closely!)

user_admin.description: The project administrator. By default appears as a resourceful squirrel architect wearing a bright yellow hard hat and tool belt, with a glowing cinnamon candy heart pendant. Appearance is customizable per project to fit the world's theme.
